content.webTitle: A cyclist's guide to biking the city – a cartoon

fields.headline: A cyclist's guide to biking the city – a cartoon
fields.bodyText: Dave Walker is a cartoonist from Langdon Hills, Essex, who often cycles in London. He is the author of The Cycling Cartoonist, published by Bloomsbury If you’re an illustrator or graphic artist with an idea for The Illustrated City series, email us at cities@theguardian.com Follow Guardian Cities on Twitter, Facebook and Instagram to join the discussion, catch up on our best stories or sign up for our weekly newsletter
